name: GameDev Fund
description: Founded by video games industry veterans, Gamedev Fund is investment fund aiming to help talented teams in shipping their games by providing knowledge, contacts, and funds. We invest in premium indie games for PC/consoles with a playable demo on hand.

name: Zabolis Partners
description: Zabolis Partners is an investment management group specializing in real estate and private equity investments

name: DOJUS group
description: DOJUS Group is a united entity of 8 companies operating in Lithuania and Latvia. As leaders in their respective fields, they contribute to the development of agricultural, forestry, and other business sectors. The company offers a wide range of services.Group of companies engaged in heavy machinery distribution, real estate and financial investments.

description: Aerospace, Information Technology, Software, Travel

name: Nextury Ventures
description: Nextury Ventures is a venture capital firm and incubator that invests in early stage startups and companies. Nextury Ventures is a Venture Capital Fund established by a prominent International Entrepreneur Ilja Laurs in partnership with Mindaugas Glodas, ICT business executive. Nextury Ventures invests in early stage startups and new fast growth and high potential value ideas.

name: ScaleWolf
description: ScaleWolf is a venture capital fund and an allied technology accelerator program focusing on dual use technologies. Dual-Use Tech VC Fund & Accelerator. A Hybrid Model for NATO Countries. Based in Vilnius, Capital of Lithuania. ScaleWolf is a leading hybrid approach of grants, acceleration, and capital.
investmentAreas: Venture Capital, Accelerator, Dual-Use Commercial, Defense

name: Katalista Ventures
description: Katalista Ventures is a hybrid startup accelerator and private equity fund. At Katalista Ventures we believe in catalysing and connecting people to help them achieve their potential while finding solutions to global challenges. Therefore, we have founded Katalista Ventures as a hybrid startup accelerator and private equity fund to provide customised support, driven by experienced entrepreneurs and professionals in the Baltics.
investmentAreas: Startup Consultancy, Early-Stage Venture Acceleration, Scaling, Investing

name: Founderheads,
description: Boutique web3 incubator, accelerator and VC with a founder mentality and hands on approach. Boutique web3 VC with a founder mentality to help you navigate the crypto industry. investmentAreas: Blockchain Services, Web3, and VC, Crypto

name: Hiaka Labs
description: Hiaka Labs is a startup studio building the future of fintech. We bring together founders, ideas and capital to drive the next wave of the fintech revolution. Hiaka Labs, a Lithuania based Professional Services organization with 10 employees and revenues of $1.0M selected Fastly for Content Delivery.

name: Bridgio
description: As a tech accelerator, we help engineering teams grow commercially successful businesses in the global marketplace. We use our experience in electronics product design, customer development and B2B sales on global hi-tech markets to ensure an exciting journey to the commercial success of your project. We help founders of hardware and software projects to construct 'tech bridge' from EUROPE (CEE) to global markets.

name: 70Ventures
description: Revenue Accelerator for Early-Stage B2B Startups. 70V has finished it's active investment period and will continue providing acceleration and fund management services to our two current funds - 70Ventures Accel and Seed. 70V portfolio companies are growing rapidly and provide a wide range of appealing career opportunities.

name: Baltic Sandbox
description: Baltic Accelerator for SaaS and Fintech startups. Sustainable value acceleration partner for the Eastern European startups. We are driven on a mission to help startups skyrocket, business angels to widen their competencies with hands-on practices, and investors not to run out of outstanding founders.

name: Contrarian Ventures
description: Contrarian Ventures are hands-on, community-focused and founders vetted European early-stage investors committed to net-zero. investmentAreas: net zero, sustainability, eco friendly, greentech

name: Practica Capital
description: Practica Capital is a dedicated Baltic VC focusing on investments in the Baltic and Baltic-origin ventures in Europe. They back great founders in their ambition in seed and selected pre-seed and A stages partnering with them as company builders.

name: FIRSTPICK
description: FIRSTPICK is a high-speed VC fund and an accelerator for tech startups in the Baltics. We aim to be the first pick of tech founders starting their journey. And the founders in our portfolio know that they always come first for our team.

name: Willgrow
description: Willgrow is a venture capital investment firm arising from a first-generation family office in the Baltics. Willgrow is an active investor in private equity, venture capital, credit funds, real assets, and promising companies worldwide. They are long-term investors with decades of entrepreneurial experience

name: Business Angels Fund
description: BAF is a venture capital firm which invests in startups, early stage companies and SMEs in Baltic region. Business Angel Fund's investment size varies between 50k and 600k EUR. BAF invests along with Business Angels same conditions .

name: Equite
description: Equite is a private multi-asset alternative investment firm that invests in potential small and medium-size companies. name: WeChange.group

name: Circle Venture Capital

name: ScaleWolf
